name: Tenebris (itch) (Benjamin Metaut, Panyny)
description:
---CONTROLS---

  • WASD / ZQSD  : Moving 
  • SPACE : hit with your hammer ! You can combo 3 attack !
  • R : use a sacred spell / hold to deliver peasant from evil

40% of Sound FX are still homemade !

Level are generated procedurally !

---How to play---

You have to kill or save every peasants in the village without letting demons kill you ! 

When its done you will have to fight a mysterious boss ! 

If you find some sacred potion take it, I think it should help you if you have no health !

---Story---

You are a paladin who investigates in a village because the peasants have been acting strangely for some time!

The place seems invaded by darkness which seems to try to take possession of all that is alive .... be careful
